race_form.race_comment: VIXONS PRIDE (5) has been in super consistent form, finishing in the minors at his the last four runs. Last time finished 3rd in an A2 on October 18 over 480m at this track behind Longacres Breeze beaten 2.25 lengths (29.24). Sure to be about the mark. SPRINGVIEW HERO (1) had been going along well winning an A3 three back then placing at this track before missing the frame latest when sixth (29.29) at this track. Can find the frame this time. BALLINAKILL JOHN (4) was unplaced two starts ago then improved to score last time out at this track over 480m (29.04). Goes up a notch but will give backers a sight. PUMA BULLY (2) must be respected despite an unplaced effort here most recently.

PUMA BULLY (2) must be respected despite an unplaced effort here most recently.

100414ae-42b8-4d48-93fa-e8cdbe845110.race_name: Download The Vickers.Bet App Handicap Chase

race_form.race_comment: TOMMYDAN (1) kept on well opening his account at Hexham however will need to bounce back from pulling-up at Sedgefield two days ago. Thereabouts if no lingering effects remain turning out again quickly. CARAPAZ (7) is an eight race maiden running off bottom weight. Finds the ideal contest to take a big step forward. YOUNG WOLF (2) has come home in front twice from three attempts over this distance. Feared. BRAGANZA BAY (4) holds solid place chances.

Thereabouts if no lingering effects remain turning out again quickly. CARAPAZ (7) is an eight race maiden running off bottom weight. Finds the ideal contest to take a big step forward. YOUNG WOLF (2) has come home in front twice from three attempts over this distance. Feared. BRAGANZA BAY (4) holds solid place chances.

race_form.race_comment: SEASONS JOSEY (2) turned in a solid run last start over 285m at this track finishing 5th and beaten only 3.5 lengths (17.09). Tough to beat if on-song. MINEOLA ADELE (5) finds it hard to break through. Has hit the frame the last two runs, the latest when second (16.98) at this track. Has a good record at this journey. Form from her last run is proving strong. Can measure up. INSANE JANE (1) is a talented type and proved too strong last time to win by 2.25 lengths at this track in a handy 17.07 beating Deecee Bluey. One of the key runners again. LULUS DELIGHT (6) is in form and worth thought again.

LULUS DELIGHT (6) is in form and worth thought again.

race_form.race_comment: BONANZA (3) ran a good race when runner-up here over this trip last time out. He returns from a spell which would have done him the world of good. Richard Fourie is a positive jockey engagement and he may be able to coax that little bit extra out of him where it matters most. WILLIAM WEST (7) showed good speed when winning his maiden here over this distance. He would have gained a lot of confidence from that outing and there should be more to come. Each-way. WYLIE JACK (8) will be peaking third up and he did well to finish fifth off a wide run last start. Include in all combinations. ELUSIVE TRADER (5) stuck on gamely when fourth here over this trip last time out. That form has since been franked and he could be returning to some of the form he showed earlier in his career. He is right in this if he brings his A-game. WARM WINTER NITE (2) resumes here after closing off his last prep with a win at this track. Hard to beat again.

He is right in this if he brings his A-game. WARM WINTER NITE (2) resumes here after closing off his last prep with a win at this track. Hard to beat again.

race_form.race_comment: BLINKANDYOUMISIT (1) turned in a fair 5th placed finish last time at this track over 500m (30.81). Looks the one to beat on her best form. FWESH ARTEMIS (4) recorded a head second in an A5 last time 30.48 at this track and trip and also jumping from the same draw. Has the ability and can measure up. PRESTIGE DIAMOND (6) turned in a fair 4th placed finish last time at this track over 500m (30.63). Has run slick time here, with a 30.04 PB at this distance. Expected to feature in the finish. TEN SIXTY SIX (2) is in form and worth thought again.

ade542d6-3612-4105-9a12-35ff0cf25ac3.race_name: Friday Night Winning Deal @ Sunderland Dogs Stakes

race_form.race_comment: KNOCKALTON BEANY (2) was below best last time but prior to that was narrowly beaten when sixth (15.98) in a D3 at this track. Likely to improve sharply this time. EMERS BLAKE (6) in the money last time at this track (16.31) in a D3, finishing a 3 length third. Among the main chances. BROTHERS DOG (3) comes off an average run last start when sixth at this track over 261m behind LUKES DANCER (16.64) in a D3. His PB at this course and distance is a swift 16.02. Cannot be taken lightly. BLACKSTONE REGAL (5) was out of the frame here most recently but can atone.

Cannot be taken lightly. BLACKSTONE REGAL (5) was out of the frame here most recently but can atone.

race_form.race_comment: IDEE NEUVE (1) maintains a consistent profile. Managed a good 2L second tackling a higher class course and distance conditions hurdle fifty three days back and is a leading contender. AVENUE DU MESNIL (4) arrives unbeaten following a pair of victories last year. Rates highly despite the absence. FORTUNES MELODY (8) caught the eye at Saint-Malo when a 15L winner of a 3900m Class Four conditions hurdle and makes for appeal. GREATTA (3) scored by 4L a 3500m Class Two conditions chase here last month. Not out of this.

GREATTA (3) scored by 4L a 3500m Class Two conditions chase here last month. Not out of this.

race_form.race_comment: BLUEJIG ROCKY (5) is a promising type who notched his 3rd career success when too good (15.83) at this track last time. Recorded the quickest time on the card last start. Looks a key chance if runs up to latest figure. FOOTFIELD WOOLY (3) turned in a better run last time to find a minor placing (16.10) at this track behind Trinity Best in a D2. Ran one of the fastest times on the program last start despite finishing in the minors. Hard to beat again. MUCHO MACHO JACK (6) finished in the money three on end before breaking through for an overdue win last start (15.98) at this track. Solid record here including 13 wins. Looks well placed here and has the ability. Go well. MAINEVALLEY BALE (4) can return to form after missing the top-three at this circuit last time out.

race_form.race_comment: JUNGLE BOND (7) won by 0.75L contesting a claiming race at Cherbourg and is selected to replicate. JULY DU GUESNE (14) finds a good opportunity third up following a 5L sixth at Cherbourg. JERIDIA MENUET (11) ran 5.5L fourth in a claimer at Enghien. Shortlist. JEZABEL (2) delivered a victory on grass at Les Andelys and is worth noting.
